overview: The creative team behind the smash hit "Saw" films, James Wan and Leigh Whannell, tell the story of a young man who is having a dog of a day. Hes just been shot dead, but his real problems are only just beginning due to a clerical error that has sent him to the wrong heaven.
tagline: Sometimes... dogs aren't the only ones that end up in...
title: Doggie Heaven (Woof!)
